value.name: Mother seeks stronger laws to prevent youth violence
value.description: Among people speaking out about violent crime in the city, LaShanna Villanueva, Diné, is raising her voice. She wants lawmakers to take a closer look at reforms to deter youth from violent crime so other families don’t lose a loved one like her family has.
